content.rendered:
LIKELY TO MOVE LISTS

Work Smarter, Not Harder

DID YOU KNOW that our Likely to Move Lists can increase your likelihood to close a deal by 537%?? 

Our data puts you in front of home sellers for a fraction of the cost of traditional marketing and in less time.

150 Data Points

We developed our Motivated Seller list by studying over 150 data points to determine which data flags increase the odds of distress and likely to move. Our algorithm produces some of the most powerful data available. 

Why Geopoint Data Likely to Move

  • Save massive time & money by increasing the probability that a homeowner is going to be motivated to sell their home.
  • We personally have used the same data to build SFR Portfolios for 5 different companies over the past 10 years.
  • Option to include homeowner's contact information with up to 10 cell phone numbers, 2 landlines & 2 email addresses
  • We have the best homeowner data & update 9 databases daily to make sure your data is always super fresh

We Warehouse...

1 0 MM
Home Addresses
1 0 MM
Land Lines
2 0 MM
Cell Phones
1 0 MM
Email Addresses
BUILD YOUR LIST NOW

Likely To Move Data Pricing

Number of Leads Phone # & Emails Included No Phone #'s or Emails
10,000+ $0.65 per lead $0.50 per lead
BUILD YOUR LIST NOW

Not sure where to start? Give us a call!

Email Us or Call 480-771-3001

"If your marketing strategies are focused on mailing, door knocking, cold calling, outbound text messaging, email, or social media strategies... Geopoint Data is your data solution."
GREG B.Wholesaler, Phoenix
"Literally our conversion rate went down to one in every seven leads started contracting and it's because of the effectiveness of your data, our scripts didn't change, our acquisitions guys didn't change, our mailer didn't change, we literally had no other variable change, it was simply your data that was so refined and so pointed that it got us in front of the right people"
Justin ColbyWholesaler, AZ
Previous
Next

THE MARKETING GAME HAS CHANGED...

Let us help you DOMINATE your market.

How Geopoint Data Clients Use Our Data

BULK MAILERS

From handwritten letters to "URGENT" postcards, you can be sure your targeting the right audience. Get more BANG for your buck.

COLD CALL & TEXT

Save massive time & money by increasing the probability that a homeowner is going to be motivated to sell their home.

SOCIAL MEDIA

Hack Facebook ad spend by only displaying ads to your custom audience. Build FB audiences via phone, email, or by name and zip.

DOOR KNOCKING

Stop randomly knocking on doors. Target homeowners with a higher likelihood of signing your contract when they open the door.

FAQ

Most frequent questions and answers
How Long Till I Receive My Lists?

We process and deliver orders in 24 hours or less.

Who are these lists for?

Anyone looking to market to homeowners including investors, realtors, and wholesalers.

Can I Append SkipTrace Data To Lists?

Yes, while building any of our data lists you will have the option to append contact information for the home homeowner. 

How Often Are Your Lists Updated?

We pull new lists every time we receive an order. Rest assured you’re getting the most up to date data.
